Patients randomize one three treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive epirubicin IV bolus cisplatin IV 4 hour day 1 plus fluorouracil IV continuously day 1-21 . - Arm II : Patients receive docetaxel IV 1 hour cisplatin IV 4 hour day 1 . - Arm III : Patients receive docetaxel cisplatin arm II fluorouracil arm I .
